name.description: Name: Airport, navaid, waypoint, intersection, or other identifier

type.description: Message type: Value is always position

ident.description: Flight Identifier: Callsign identifying the flight. Typically, ICAO airline code plus IATA/ticketing flight number, or the aircraft registration.

lat.description: Latitude: In decimal degrees, rounded to 4 decimal points

lon.description: Longitude: In decimal degrees, rounded to 4 decimal points

clock.description: Report Time: POSIX epoch format. Time should be the time generated by flight hardware if possible

id.description: FlightAware flight id: FlightAware flight id: Unique identifier associated with each flight (faFlightID)

updateType.description: Update Type: Specifies source of message, A for ADS-B, Z for radar, O for transoceanic, P for estimated, D for datalink, M for Multilateration (MLAT), X for ASDE-X, S for Space-based ADS-B

air_ground.description: Air/Ground: Air/Ground or Weight-on-Wheel (WOW) switch... "A" air, "G" ground

facility_hash.description: Reporting facility hash: A consistent and unique obfusticated identifier string for each source reporting positions to FlightAware

facility_name.description: Reporting facility name: A description of the reporting facility intended for end-user consumption. May be a blank string if undefined.

pitr.description: Point In Time Recovery: Timestamp value that should be supplied to the "pitr" connection initiation command when reconnecting and you wish to resume firehose playback at that approximate position

altChange.description: Altitude Change: "C" for climbing, "D" for descending, " " when undetermined

squawk.description: Transponder squawk code: 4 digit octal transponder beacon code assigned by ATC

hexid.description: Transponder Mode S code: 24-bit Mode S transponder code assigned by aircraft registrar. Formatted in upper case hexadecimal

atcident.description: ATC Ident: Identifier used for ATC, if it differs from flight identifier

aircrafttype.description: Aircraft Type: ICAO aircraft type code

orig.description: Origin: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair

dest.description: Destination: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair. May be missing if not known.

reg.description: Aircraft Registration: The tail number or registration of the aircraft, if known and it differs from the ident.

eta.description: ETA: Estimated Time of Arrival. POSIX epoch format

edt.description: Estimated Departure Time: Revised timestamp of when the flight is expected to depart. POSIX epoch format

ete.description: En route Time: In seconds. May be missing if not known.

waypoints.description: Waypoints: 2D, 3D, or 4D list of locations, times, and altitudes formatted as a list of JSON arrays

adsb_version.description: ADS-B Version: ADS-B version used by transmitter responsible for position, when known/applicable

nac_p.description: NACp: ADS-B Navigational Accuracy Category for Position

nac_v.description: NACv: ADS-B Navigational Accuracy Category for Velocity

nic_baro.description: NIC Baro: ADS-B Navigation Integrity Category for Barometer

sil_type.description: SIL Type: ADS-B Source Integrity Level type (applies per-hour or per-sample)

pos_rc.description: Radius of Containment: ADS-B Radius of Containment, in meters

heading_magnetic.description: Magnetic Heading: The aircraft's heading, in degrees, relative to magnetic north.

heading_true.description: True Heading: The aircraft's heading, in degrees, relative to true north.

mach.description: Mach Number: The mach number of the aircraft.

speed_tas.description: True Airspeed: The true airspeed of the aircraft, reported in knots.

speed_ias.description: Indicated Airspeed: The indicated airspeed of the aircraft, reported in knots.

pressure.description: Computed Static Air Pressure: The computed static air pressure, given in hPa.

wind_quality.description: Wind Quality: The value is 1 if the aircraft is stable (not maneuvering) and 0 if the aircraft is maneuvering. Derived wind data is less reliable if the aircraft is maneuvering.

wind_dir.description: Computed Wind Direction: The computed wind direction, in degrees, relative to true north. The value uses the normal convention where the direction is opposite the wind vector (i.e. wind_dir = 0 means wind from the north).

wind_speed.description: Computed Wind Speed: The computed wind speed, given in knots.

temperature_quality.description: Temperature Quality: The value is 0 if the derived temperature is likely to be inaccurate due to quantization errors, 0 otherwise.

temperature.description: Computed Outside Air Temperature: The computed outside air temperature, given in degrees Celsius.

nav_heading.description: Navigation Heading: The heading, in degrees, from the navigation equipment.

nav_altitude.description: Navigation Altitude: The altitude setting, in feet, from the navigation equipment.

nav_qnh.description: Navigation Altimeter Setting: The altimeter setting, in hPa, that has been set.

nav_modes.description: Navigation Modes: The list of active modes from the navigation equipment. Possible values are autopilot, vnav, althold, approach, lnav, tcas.
